title: Juicy4U
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Colorful cafe behind the eastern corner of Moon Mueang Rd. Serves Thai food, western breakfast, a house-made veggie burger, soups, salads, hot drinks, a variety of vegetable juices and fruit smoothies. Uses fresh organic produce from its own farm. Current owners since Nov 2012.
